name: WDC Shift Management Contact Graph Extension
description: Extending WDC to do more complicated relationship queries using Neo4j from Graphene and Heroku.

SFDCUSERNAME.description: Org's username. Needs read access to Shift, Employee, Individual, Contact, ServiceTerritory, ServiceResource objects.

SFDCPASSWORD.description: Your user password, with Dev Token appended.

SFCLIENTID.description: OAuth Client ID from the Connected App you made.

SFCLIENTSECRET.description: OAuth Client Secret from the Connected App you made.

SFREDIRECT.description: OAuth Redirect URL from the Connected App you made.
